import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Dashboard.css'; const Dashboard = () => { const [selectedMedicine, setSelectedMedicine] = useState(null); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const [showAddModal, setShowAddModal] = useState(false); const expiringMedicines = [ { id: 1, name: 'Ventolin Inhaler', category: 'Respiratory', currentStock: 89, daysUntilExpiry: 25, reorderPoint: 50, manufacturer: 'GSK', storageLocation: 'Storage C-02', serialNumber: 'VEN-2024-001', expiryDate: '2024-05-15', status: 'Attention', unit: 'tablets', tags: ['In Stock', 'Cardiology'] }, // Add more medicines as needed ]; const handleAddNewItem = () => { setShowAddModal(true); }; const handleGenerateReport = () => { // Add report generation logic console.log('Generating report...'); }; const handleUpdateStock = (medicineId) => { // Add stock update logic console.log('Updating stock for medicine:', medicineId); }; const handlePlaceOrder = (medicineId) => { // Add order placement logic console.log('Placing order for medicine:', medicineId); }; const handleViewHistory = (medicineId) => { // Add history viewing logic console.log('Viewing history for medicine:', medicineId); }; // Medicine Detail Modal Component const MedicineDetailModal = ({ medicine, onClose }) => (
e.stopPropagation()}>

{medicine.name}

{medicine.category}

Current Stock

{medicine.currentStock}

{medicine.unit}

Days Until Expiry

{medicine.daysUntilExpiry}

days remaining

Reorder Point

{medicine.reorderPoint}

minimum stock

Product Information

{medicine.manufacturer}

{medicine.storageLocation}

{medicine.serialNumber}

{medicine.expiryDate}

{medicine.tags.map((tag, index) => ( {tag} ))}
{medicine.daysUntilExpiry <= 30 && (

Expiry Warning

Product will expire in {medicine.daysUntilExpiry} days

)}
); // Add New Item Modal Component const AddItemModal = ({ onClose }) => (
e.stopPropagation()}>

Add New Item

); return (
{/* Top Navigation */}

Code Vortex

Dashboard Inventory Orders Predictions Reports
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Welcome Banner */}

Hello, Mike!

Welcome back to your dashboard

{/* Expiring Soon Section */}

Expiring Soon

{expiringMedicines.length} items
{expiringMedicines.map(medicine => ( setSelectedMedicine(medicine)}> ))}
Description Category Days Left Status Actions
{medicine.name} {medicine.category} {medicine.daysUntilExpiry} days {medicine.status}
{/* Modals */} {showModal && selectedMedicine && ( setShowModal(false)} /> )} {showAddModal && ( setShowAddModal(false)} /> )}
); }; export default Dashboard;
